title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official CLI and library for running Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally with minimal setup.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for the Ollama server, published on npm as ‘ollama’.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama, available on PyPI; supports sync/async chat, pull, push, and embeddings.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain community integration that wraps Ollama models as LLM and embeddings components.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI (formerly Ollama WebUI) that talks to the local Ollama API; supports multi-model chats, code highlighting, and RAG.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Lightweight retrieval-augmented generation pipeline using Ollama embeddings and Chroma vector store.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that brings local Ollama models into the GitHub Copilot chat sidebar.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Interactive terminal UI (TUI) for browsing and chatting with Ollama models, written in Rust.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama with Spring Boot starters; available on Maven Central.

title: ollama-dotnet
summary: .NET SDK and CLI tool for Ollama, distributed via NuGet; supports chat, completions, and embeddings.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration providing OllamaGenerator and OllamaTextEmbedder nodes for pipelines.

title: ollama-cookbook
summary: Community-curated recipes for deploying, fine-tuning, and integrating Ollama models in production.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart for running Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU node-selector and autoscaling.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Async Rust crate on crates.io that wraps the Ollama REST API with Serde models.

title: ollama-streamlit
summary: Streamlit chat app that uses Ollama for fully local LLM conversations with session memory.
